page.title: 11FASHION
page.content: {FASHION Fashion has seen great changes during the 1980's in this area.Clothes are no longer marketed for teenagers(due to unemployment) it has shifted to the 9 -12 year olds(children of the employed ).They mostly favour expensive fashion sportswear makes as TACHINI,NIKE, LACOSTE,ADIDAS,FELA.These are european makes & are all expensive.Those made in Taiwan are cheaper and not considered "in"e.g FRED PERRY,LE COQ SPORTIF,SLAZENGER.Expensive trainers were also popular.NIKE,ADIDAS,NB, SAUCONY,HI-TEC. {SURVEY} At school 24 out of 30 pupils were in favour of uniform.But out of school our survey shows the most popular makes were 1st ADIDAS 2nd NIKE&HI-TEC 3rd ST MICHAEL.17were allowed to chose there own clothes 10 agreed with
